ComicInfo.Title: The Wooden Man; My Brother...The Ghoul; Step Right into the...House of Horror; The Ghost Still Walks; He Dwells in a Dungeon
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Wooden Man: A ventriloquist and his dummy are not what they seem.
My Brother...The Ghoul: A graverobber with an identical twin meets his doom.
Step Right into the...House of Horror: A haunted house investigator and a reporter visit an old mansion.
The Ghost Still Walks: A fraternity initiation leads to a death.
He Dwells in a Dungeon: A woman plans to kill her disfigured future brother-in-law, but makes a fatal mistake.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Authorized A. C. M. P. Conforms to the Comics Code
ComicInfo.Penciller: Al Fass,George Roussos,Jim Mooney,Joe Sinnott,Ross Andru
